jobDescription: Position Overview:MSCI Index Sales Specialists are responsible for maintaining existing client relationships as well as new business development for MSCI products. Each person travels within their respective sales territory to meet with clients regarding new products as well as enhancements to existing products.  The role entails educating, positioning and licensing MSCIs global equity index data to current clients as well as prospective clientele. Sales Specialists use their knowledge of the investment management process, modern portfolio theory, and data distribution platforms (Bloomberg, Factset, Thompson, etc.) to identify solutions using MSCI tools for their clients.  This role is a highly visible one, with involvement in all aspects of account management, including senior level relationship management, in-depth discussions regarding MSCIs index methodology, commercial terms and contract negotiation, closing sales, and product setup and delivery. Education of the enhancements and evolution of how our indices are used by the investment community is ongoing. In this role, individuals will work very closely with MSCI Product Management, Global Client Service, Client Consultants, Marketing, Global Sales Colleagues, Legal Counsel and Finance Operations.Scope of Responsibility:Total Relationship Management involving:High level management contactStrategic planning within territory and key accountsNew product placementIdentification of opportunities across other business segmentsAbility to answer detailed client inquiries about MSCI products and methodologiesStrive to achieve or exceed targeted revenue goalsProactively keep all clients up to date about MSCI products, announcements, projects, etcWork with other teams and departments to ensure that all client requests and inquiries are managed appropriatelyMaintain accurate records regarding account visits, client conversations, finalized contracts, etc.Proactively solicit client feedback regarding new initiatives and future product developmentProvide feedback from clients to the Product Management Unit, Marketing, Sales Colleagues and ResearchDesired Experience:Bachelors Degree Required or equivalent experience;
